name: Create clients in Bidsketch from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new client in Bidsketch. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/11PjS78CSImia-k1QBV9rzABZwplDfG_DHuN6XzY0eFw/edit?usp=sharing).
